name: AI Mock Interview Preparation
desc: An AI powered mock interview preparation platform. It uses Gemini AI API to generate questions and answers.

name: Turtle Race Game
desc: Developed a turtle race game using python. It uses turtle graphics to draw the game. It allows user to bet on turtles.

name: Secure Password Generator
desc: A simple password generator which generates secure passwords. It uses random library from python to generate the password adn tkinter for GUI.

name: Student Satisfaction Survey
desc: An basic student satisfaction survey web application. It allows students to submit their feedback.

name: Brand Page Website
desc: A simple brand page website built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. It provides basic information about the brand.

name: Blog Website
desc: A Blog website build using MERN stack. It allows users to create, read, update and delete blogs.

name: Snake Game
desc: A snake game built using JavaScript. It uses HTML canvas to draw the game. Also it stores the high score in local storage.

name: Grocery Store
desc: A grocery store website build using PHP. It allows users to create, read, update and delete products. It uses MySQL for database.

name: Plant Species Identifier using CNN
desc: Plant Species Identifier using Convolutional Neural Network. It uses TensorFlow and Keras for training the model.
